issue.title: [CF 1014] Create spell groups for Lethal and Non-Lethal Poisons
issue.body:
Much like there already is a group for stun spells, could you please add two groups for rogue's Lethal and Non-Lethal Poisons?

Lethal: Deadly (2823), Wound (8679), Instant (157607)
Non-Lethal: Crippling (3408), Leeching (112961)

Thank you.


> Posted by CurseForge user nordveien | Imported from CurseForge issue #1014 | Raw

comments.body:
No. Just enter the debuffs in yourself if you want to track them in the same icon. As with all settings in TellMeWhen, you can look at the tooltips for the "Choose spell(s) to check" input field (separate each poison with a semicolon).


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Allright, that works. Didn't think to test it in the first place because the icon I needed it for was a Buff/Debuff Check icon and I thought that if several buffs were listed, it would go off if ANY one of them is absent. But in reality it goes off only if ALL of them are absent and doesn't go off if one of the listed buffs is present, which is just what I needed. Thanks.


> Posted by CurseForge user nordveien
